          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Quiz ad immagini su Vienna</string>
            <string language="en">Picture Quiz Vienna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung Quiz Wien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu Vienne d'Image</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Viena Do Retrato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων Βιέννη εικόνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Concurso Viena Del Cuadro</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli allievi possono diventare esperti mediante 18 vedute famose di Vienna.</string>
            <string language="en">Students can become familiar with 18 famous Viennese sights.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Vienna</string>
            <string language="en">Vienna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">vedute di Vienna</string>
            <string language="en">sights of Vienna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">posti famosi</string>
            <string language="en">famous places</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">costruzioni famose</string>
            <string language="en">famous buildings</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können mit 18 berühmtem Wiener 
Anblick vertraut werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants peuvent se familiariser avec 18 vues
viennoises célèbres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes podem tornar-se familiares com as 18
vistas viennese famosas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να γίνουν εξοικειωμένοι με 18
διάσημες βιενέζικες θέες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes pueden hacer familiares con 18 
vistas vienesas famosas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anblick von Wien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">berühmte Plätze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">berühmte Gebäude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vienne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vues de Vienne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">endroits célèbres</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Far conoscere agli studenti luoghi ed edifici famosi di Vienna. Essi possono anche cercare sulla rete altre informazioni, se vogliono saperne di più.</string>
            <string language="en">Make students familiar with famous buildings and places of Vienna. They can also search the net for further information, if they want to learn more.</string>
